Professional stump grinding and tree removal services throughout St. Johns County, Florida. Serving St. Augustine, Ponte Vedra, and all surrounding communities.

Serving All of St. Johns County

St. Johns County's Trusted Tree Service

Stump Masters Jax provides professional stump grinding and tree removal services throughout St. Johns County. From historic St. Augustine to upscale Ponte Vedra communities, we bring the same veteran-owned dedication and expertise to every project.

St. Johns County is known for its historic charm, beautiful beaches, and upscale communities. We understand the high standards expected in St. Johns County and deliver exceptional results that respect your property's character and value.

We offer next-day service throughout St. Johns County, with same-day availability in many areas. Whether you're in coastal Ponte Vedra or historic St. Augustine, we're ready to serve you.
